product_description: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion 400ml
review_title: A miracle in a bottle! Absolutely love this product!
review_text: I suffer with dry sensitive skin and vaseline is one of very few products that doesn't make my skin flare up and itch like crazy!The first thing I noticed was the beautiful fresh smell that escaped as I lifted the cap, as I applied a drop to my skin I instantly felt a soothing relief and easily moisturised into my skin absorbing effortlessly and not at all greasy unlike alot of other moisturisers I've tried! I use this product every day and it has improved my dry skin condition massively couldn't recommend this product enough I absolutely love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion 400ml
review_text: So prior to receiving this I had pretty rough elbows in particular and my skin feels dry. As a busy mum of two I admit I sometimes neglect myself.. some of you may empathise! But this product trial gave me the perfect opportunity to reconnect with myself and have a bit of \u201Cme time\u201D. So for 3 days after my baths / shower I smothered myself with this. I must admit the first time I put this on I wasn\u2019t sure about the smell. It\u2019s not offensive it\u2019s like a cucumber smell (although it\u2019s aloe) but I tend to smell of perfumes all the time.. however by day 3 I actually liked the smell. Application: it went on nicely not too thick and soaked in pretty quickly it didn\u2019t feel sticky. I always have my morning wash by 07:30 but even in the evening before bedtime my skin is feeling noticibly softer and my rough elbows gone. Verdict: thumbs up. Yes I will be continuing to use this thank you for a fab product trial and for introducing me to Vaseline Aloe! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
title_review_comments: Skin so soft.. highly recommend! So prior to receiving this I had pretty rough elbows in particular and my skin feels dry. Yes I will be continuing to use this thank you for a fab product trial and for introducing me to Vaseline Aloe! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Simple Kind To Skin Purifying Cleansing Lotion 200ml
review_text: Have used a lot of make-up brands and in the past bought their more expensive make-up remover products, but none have ever removed mascara, eye-shadow, foundation bases etc as gently and as well as Simple Cleansing Lotion. Its consistency is not runny, you have to squeeze the bottle appropriately onto the cotton wool, which is ideal for controlling how much is dispensed. Also great for tidying up eyeliner or mascara errors when applied sparsely on a cotton wool bud. Always keep this now in my bathroom cabinet. Why pay more?
title_review_comments: Best Make-up remover product Have used a lot of make-up brands and in the past bought their more expensive make-up remover products, but none have ever removed mascara, eye-shadow, foundation bases etc as gently and as well as Simple Cleansing Lotion. Its consistency is not runny, you have to squeeze the bottle appropriately onto the cotton wool, which is ideal for controlling how much is dispensed. Also great for tidying up eyeliner or mascara errors when applied sparsely on a cotton wool bud. Always keep this now in my bathroom cabinet. Why pay more?

product_description: Dove  Invisible Dry Anti-perspirant Deodorant Stick 40ml
review_title: Good if you have sensitive skin
review_text: This is a good deodorant if you have easily irritated skin. It's like Dove soap in that it doesn't seem to irritate or dry out skin. I've used Dove soaps for quite a long time and this is certainly something which they are good for, this seems to be as good as all of them. It's main selling point, beyond being an effective 24 hour deodorant, is that it is not prone to marking your clothes. It certainly seems to work as far as that goes too, though we haven't been able to test on every single colour. Good though. Recommended.
title_review_comments: Good if you have sensitive skin This is a good deodorant if you have easily irritated skin. It's like Dove soap in that it doesn't seem to irritate or dry out skin. I've used Dove soaps for quite a long time and this is certainly something which they are good for, this seems to be as good as all of them. It's main selling point, beyond being an effective 24 hour deodorant, is that it is not prone to marking your clothes. product_description: Simple Water Boost Skin Quench Sleeping Cream 50ml
review_text: This cream is light, odourless and leaves the skin feeling genuinely smooth, supple and refreshed. I use it as part of my nightly routine - applying it when going to bed after washing and drying my face. It is light enough not to clog the pores or feel sticky on the face, and in the morning my face always feels smooth and replenished. I have also tried using this cream during the daytime and, while it has all the benefits described above, it\u2019s not long-lasting enough in terms of the hydration it gives, meaning you often feel the need to reapply after a few hours. All in all a great overnight moisturiser if you have sensitive skin - it\u2019s unscented and it\u2019s really gentle on sore patches. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
title_review_comments: Smooth, clear skin This cream is light, odourless and leaves the skin feeling genuinely smooth, supple and refreshed. I use it as part of my nightly routine - applying it when going to bed after washing and drying my face. It is light enough not to clog the pores or feel sticky on the face, and in the morning my face always feels smooth and replenished. I have also tried using this cream during the daytime and, while it has all the benefits described above, it\u2019s not long-lasting enough in terms of the hydration it gives, meaning you often feel the need to reapply after a few hours. All in all a great overnight moisturiser if you have sensitive skin - it\u2019s unscented and it\u2019s really gentle on sore patches. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Bovril  Extract Beef and Yeast 250g
review_text: We all crave things that transport us back to more innocent times. For me Bovril is one of those things, from the gooey unctuousness of the tar black bovril overflowing from the spoon to the "ding ding ding" as I stir it in hot water to make it dissolve and the earthy, beefy smell with hints of celery and goodness knows what else. Sometimes you can get alcohol fatigue so Bovril is a great alternative to a nightcap or even mug of tea. I even go so far as to dissolve a pat of butter in it too for extra richness and within an hour I'm pretty much knocked out and sleep soundly until morning, warm and comforted. This pack will last me a long time I am sure, certainly 2 winters.
title_review_comments: A perfect winter drink We all crave things that transport us back to more innocent times. For me Bovril is one of those things, from the gooey unctuousness of the tar black bovril overflowing from the spoon to the "ding ding ding" as I stir it in hot water to make it dissolve and the earthy, beefy smell with hints of celery and goodness knows what else. Sometimes you can get alcohol fatigue so Bovril is a great alternative to a nightcap or even mug of tea. I even go so far as to dissolve a pat of butter in it too for extra richness and within an hour I'm pretty much knocked out and sleep soundly until morning, warm and comforted. This pack will last me a long time I am sure, certainly 2 winters.

Will continue to buy these as a staple.

product_description: Comfort  Pure Fabric Conditioner 36 Wash 1.26L
review_text: While I like the product, the bottle is unsuitable. The plastic is very thin, which is a good thing, and this means it almost impossible to pick up the bottle and fill the very small cap without spilling a significant amount, especially when the bottle is still relatively full. Do buy this, but only if you are happy to decant the content into a sturdier bottle.
title_review_comments: Unsuitable bottle - SPILLAGE While I like the product, the bottle is unsuitable. The plastic is very thin, which is a good thing, and this means it almost impossible to pick up the bottle and fill the very small cap without spilling a significant amount, especially when the bottle is still relatively full. Do buy this, but only if you are happy to decant the content into a sturdier bottle.

product_description: Dove  Deeply Nourishing Body wash 500ml
review_text: I usually buy organic cosmetics and wanted a natural product without the high price tag. I was delighted to find this! This shower cream is one of the few big brands which does not contain SLS, a harmful skin irritant added as a foaming agent to create a lather. It is silky smooth, thick and creamy, gentle on the skin, and rich enough to moisturise my dry mature skin. It has a gorgeous delicate fragrance and feels far more expensive than it is. Excellent value, especially for a product which contains no Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate or Parabens.
title_review_comments: Gorgeous shower cream, no SLS! I usually buy organic cosmetics and wanted a natural product without the high price tag. I was delighted to find this! This shower cream is one of the few big brands which does not contain SLS, a harmful skin irritant added as a foaming agent to create a lather. It is silky smooth, thick and creamy, gentle on the skin, and rich enough to moisturise my dry mature skin. It has a gorgeous delicate fragrance and feels far more expensive than it is. Excellent value, especially for a product which contains no Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate or Parabens.

product_description: Hellmann's  Real Squeezy mayonnaise 750ml
review_text: The mayonnaise would get 5 stars from me for taste but the container is style over substance. The squeezy bottle is, in itself, a genius idea but thats where it stops. It is too tall for the size of cap making it top heavy and unstable. Every bottle Ive ever put in my fridge has tumbled out. The cap is made of brittle plastic so it shatters as it hits the kitchen floor. Its like Groundhog Day each time it happens! Then, as other reviewers have commented, its impossible to get all the product out of the bottle. Surely this container is crying out for a design overhaul?
title_review_comments: shame about the bottle! The mayonnaise would get 5 stars from me for taste but the container is style over substance. product_description: Simple Water Boost Skin Quench Sleeping Cream 50ml
review_text: I do like the Simple brand products as I have sensitive skin and I need to be really careful with chemicals. This Simple Face Moisturiser moisturiser is fantastic. It has very little smell. It has a gel like consistency without the stickiness or gloopiness of some other products that are on the market. The moisturiser applies well to the skin and sinks in quickly leaving my skin feeling refreshed and moisturised with no heaviness or stickiness. I had no reaction to this moisturiser at all. I have a combination skin and this moisturiser was ideal as it has no greasiness. After a few hours of wearing I find that my skin feels totally normal, there is no greasiness at all which I sometimes get with creamy moisturisers. Also I found that I could apply makeup easily within a short period of time as the moisturiser sunk into my skin easily. I have light wrinkles and although the moisturiser can not perform miracles it did prevent my skin from drying over the day from the effects of heating or the sun. I think that this is one of the best moisturisers that I have used. It does the job with no side effects.
title_review_comments: Lovely gel moisturiser I do like the Simple brand products as I have sensitive skin and I need to be really careful with chemicals. This Simple Face Moisturiser moisturiser is fantastic. It has very little smell. It has a gel like consistency without the stickiness or gloopiness of some other products that are on the market. The moisturiser applies well to the skin and sinks in quickly leaving my skin feeling refreshed and moisturised with no heaviness or stickiness. I had no reaction to this moisturiser at all. I have a combination skin and this moisturiser was ideal as it has no greasiness. After a few hours of wearing I find that my skin feels totally normal, there is no greasiness at all which I sometimes get with creamy moisturisers. Also I found that I could apply makeup easily within a short period of time as the moisturiser sunk into my skin easily. I have light wrinkles and although the moisturiser can not perform miracles it did prevent my skin from drying over the day from the effects of heating or the sun. I think that this is one of the best moisturisers that I have used. It does the job with no side effects.

product_description: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion 400ml
review_text: So prior to receiving this I had pretty rough elbows in particular and my skin feels dry. As a busy mum of two I admit I sometimes neglect myself.. some of you may empathise! But this product trial gave me the perfect opportunity to reconnect with myself and have a bit of \u201Cme time\u201D. So for 3 days after my baths / shower I smothered myself with this. I must admit the first time I put this on I wasn't sure about the smell. It's not offensive it's like a cucumber smell (although it's aloe) but I tend to smell of perfumes all the time.. however by day 3 I actually liked the smell. Application: it went on nicely not too thick and soaked in pretty quickly it didn't feel sticky. I always have my morning wash by 07:30 but even in the evening before bedtime my skin is feeling noticibly softer and my rough elbows gone. Verdict: thumbs up. Yes I will be continuing to use this thank you for a fab product trial and for introducing me to Vaseline Aloe! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Persil  Silk and Wool Washing Liquid 15 Wash 750ml
review_title: have been using for years, works well on all my silk, wool and linen items
review_text: I have been using this for years and it works really well; it has not damaged any of my clothes. it has not left a residue on any of my clothes. it keeps my clothes in good condition and colour. it has not irritated my sensitive skin in any way. I have been using Persil silk and wool for years and it is really good. I only looked on Amazon as my supermarket had not had any for 3 weeks in a row, and realised it costs about the same here on Amazon Pantry. I wash my silk, wool and linen items on a silk wash ( on my washing machine that is a setting, but I think it comes to the following...30 degrees C, light action, very low spin cycle - very important not to hard spin wool or silk, ruins the fibres) I hang them up to dry. all of these items are either hand wash only or dry clean only items, and quite honestly I do not have the strength to hand wash or the wish to dry clean. This has worked well for me for 10+ years using this detergent.
title_review_comments: have been using for years, works well on all my silk, wool and linen items I have been using this for years and it works really well; it has not damaged any of my clothes. it has not left a residue on any of my clothes. it keeps my clothes in good condition and colour. it has not irritated my sensitive skin in any way. I have been using Persil silk and wool for years and it is really good. I only looked on Amazon as my supermarket had not had any for 3 weeks in a row, and realised it costs about the same here on Amazon Pantry. I wash my silk, wool and linen items on a silk wash ( on my washing machine that is a setting, but I think it comes to the following...30 degrees C, light action, very low spin cycle - very important not to hard spin wool or silk, ruins the fibres) I hang them up to dry. all of these items are either hand wash only or dry clean only items, and quite honestly I do not have the strength to hand wash or the wish to dry clean. This has worked well for me for 10+ years using this detergent.

product_description: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Body Lotion 400ml
review_title: Light, non greasy and super moisturising.
review_text: Winter is really taking its toll on my skin and this moisturiser has been wonderful. It soaks in fast, isn't greasy at all and has a really refreshing aloe scent as well. It does everything I need to and does it well. It's water based so probably not best for oily skin, but on my normal to dry it's doing great. I'm pretty sensitive too but this hasn't caused any problems. However, it also contains Palm Oil. Now, palm oil is a brilliant ingredient and does a lot of wonderful things. But at the moment, it's rarely ethically sourced and that's my only issue with this product. Unilever are a big big player and need to address this issue. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
title_review_comments: Light, non greasy and super moisturising. Winter is really taking its toll on my skin and this moisturiser has been wonderful. It soaks in fast, isn't greasy at all and has a really refreshing aloe scent as well. It does everything I need to and does it well. It's water based so probably not best for oily skin, but on my normal to dry it's doing great. I'm pretty sensitive too but this hasn't caused any problems. However, it also contains Palm Oil. Now, palm oil is a brilliant ingredient and does a lot of wonderful things. But at the moment, it's rarely ethically sourced and that's my only issue with this product. Unilever are a big big player and need to address this issue. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Ben & Jerry's  Phish Food Ice Cream 500ml
review_title: Lovely ice cream with plenty of chocolate fish
review_text: I received a tub of this to try. We had it for dessert after Sunday lunch and one tub was sufficient for all 4 of us. The children both loved it of course (and gave it a million stars out of 5) and particularly enjoyed counting how many chocolate fish they found. I thought it was a really nice chocolate ice cream with plenty of chocolate fish - much more than I expected - but didnt really think there was a lot of caramel or marshmallow content, which was a shame. I would, however, buy this product again.
title_review_comments: Lovely ice cream with plenty of chocolate fish I received a tub of this to try. We had it for dessert after Sunday lunch and one tub was sufficient for all 4 of us. The children both loved it of course (and gave it a million stars out of 5) and particularly enjoyed counting how many chocolate fish they found. I thought it was a really nice chocolate ice cream with plenty of chocolate fish - much more than I expected - but didnt really think there was a lot of caramel or marshmallow content, which was a shame. I would, however, buy this product again.

product_description: Simple Kind To Skin Hydrating Light Moisturiser 125ml
review_text: I've been using this moisturiser daily for 5+ years and it's always been great for the price. However a recent formula change means that it now stings slightly to apply, and has caused dermatitis to flare up around my eyes. I've compared the ingredients from before and think it's possibly due to the inclusion of 2-bromo-2-nitropropane-1,3-diol. Dissapoiting as was always super reliable before, even for my picky skin. Hopefully they'll change the formula back otherwise I won't be buying it again
title_review_comments: Formula change :( I've been using this moisturiser daily for 5+ years and it's always been great for the price. However a recent formula change means that it now stings slightly to apply, and has caused dermatitis to flare up around my eyes. I've compared the ingredients from before and think it's possibly due to the inclusion of 2-bromo-2-nitropropane-1,3-diol. Dissapoiting as was always super reliable before, even for my picky skin. Hopefully they'll change the formula back otherwise I won't be buying it again

product_description: Simple  Refreshing Shower Gel 250ml
review_text: As a regular user of a number of simple products, I was very impressed with there refreshing shower gel. I suffer with quite dry skin during the winter, and when using other brands of shower gel they can sometimes act harshly and leave my skin quite dry and flaky, especially on my face. However with this simple shower gel this is not the case. It does not irritate my skin in face it leaves my complexion looking clearer and my skin feeling soft. The size of the bottle is adequate for everyday use and regular use. And although the packaging is quite mild it does the job. I would definitely choose this shower gel out of the choice. A little bit goes a long way, and the product has a pleasent scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Surf  Tropical Lily Washing Liquid 85 Wash 3L
review_text: Surf Tropical Lily & Ylang Ylang is a fab laundry detergent  awesome smell, brilliant cleaning power  gets clothes bright clean, fresh even on cold washes. I love how it makes things smell, lasts for some time and great cleaning power on general stains like tea, deodorant marks, mud, spag bol so great for our family. Really easy to store, use and does. I have often rubbed a little into clothing if there is a particular stain like spag bol in case it needs a little more attention which works wonders even on whites! Really great value and having used it on delicate lingerie cottons, towels, silk dresses, man-made fiber clothing like work clothes, I have no complaints with general washing, highly recommend.

It doesn2019t irritate my skin like some other brands I2019ve tried do (despite not having sensitive skin) and my blackheads and spots are clearing up. A great product at a very affordable price range. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

product_description: Persil Powercaps Non Bio Washing Capsules 38 Wash, 1026g
review_title: Extremely good value Persil washing capsules
review_text: Some things in life are enjoyable to buy and some things plainly are not. No matter how pretty the product and how bright and bold the actual washing detergent is, it will always be a grudge purchase. No one likes to have dirty smelly clothes and wash powder / tablets / capsules are a necessity that makes a hole in everyone's weekly grocery budget that could be better spent on something interesting such as cakes or exotic vegetables that you have to look up how to cook. Along with Ariel, Fairy and Bold, Persil is one of the big brands that dominant the market for detergents. It is owned by global consumer products giant Unilever who are experts at branding and marketing. It is refreshing to see these capsules at such reasonable value., they work out 15p each which is an absolute bargain. Even the dodgy imitation ones you find in sub prime supermarkets are more than these, and the great thing about Persil is that you can guarantee that the product is going to be high quality. These capsules come in a rubbery gossamer coated casing containing a different brightly coloured gel like liquids in each of the four compartments. And very funky they look too with purple, green, white and grey swirls of gu. These things wash your clothes nicely too and have a pleasant smell without being too overbearing. I have no idea what happens to the plasticated casing on the outside of the capsule after you put in in the washing machine. Maybe it bio-de-grades, maybe it disappears by magic, this is one of lives great mysteries like the Great Sphinx at Giza, the Bermuda Triangle or the meaning of the Voynich Manuscript.

I have no idea what happens to the plasticated casing on the outside of the capsule after you put in in the washing machine. Maybe it bio-de-grades, maybe it disappears by magic, this is one of lives great mysteries like the Great Sphinx at Giza, the Bermuda Triangle or the meaning of the Voynich Manuscript.

review_title: Stay dry all day and night
review_text: I have tried so many antiperspirants and all have let me down. LYNX is the only brand I can use that keeps me dry all day and night. I used to think that LYNX was just for teenagers and I had tried to move onto more expensive brands aimed at the mid-range male market, but they just didn't work as good as I had hoped. I have returned to LYNX and now I smell good and stay dry.

product_description: Simple Kind To Skin Soothing Facial Toner 200ml
review_text: Although I love and regularly use a number of simple skincare products I have avoided using facial toner due to a bad experience when using another major brand which left me with extremely dry flaky skin.However this toner does not make my skin sting at all, in fact it feels like like a moisturising water which leaves me with fresh dewy skin all day. My skin looks clearer and feels so smooth. I2019ve been using this Product 2/3 times a week now and it has deffinately changed my opinion on toners. Cannot reccomend enough!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I wouldn't use these alone as I feel they don't remove everything but they are great for a rush or if you don't have face wash handy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

review_text: Although I love and regularly use a number of simple skincare products I have avoided using facial toner due to a bad experience when using another major brand which left me with extremely dry flaky skin. product_description: Vaseline  Original Petroleum Jelly 250ml
review_title: What Happened to My Old Faithful?!?
review_text: I have used Vaseline on my lips for well over 20 years and loved it. I buy a large jar of plain Vaseline and use on my lips. I loved that there is really no smell or taste to it. BUT last week, I bought a new jar, put some on, and it has a taste that I can only explain of tasting like black oil that goes into a car. It is terrible! I2019ve tried using it for a week now, and just can2019t stand it any longer. I2019m guessing there2019s been a formula or ingredient supplier change? I hope you will bring back the old version. Very disappointed!

product_description: Simple Regeneration Age Resisting Eye Cream 15ml
review_text: Time after time I return to this product. While it is designed probably for younger skin I am in my 50's with menopausal skin which is sometimes irritated and find that this cream helps to calm down excema , redness etc. On its own it does not reduce the wrinkles and crepey skin that come with aging but when layered and used in conjunction with hyaluronic based creams that are water based it makes a wonderful companion and does a good job of making my eyes look reasonable and ironing out some of the wrinkles and loss of firmness. It is easily absorbed , doesn't leave greasy skin so is great under make up. Can be used with day or night eye creams. Best of all it's a good price.
title_review_comments: Essential Go to treatment Time after time I return to this product. While it is designed probably for younger skin I am in my 50's with menopausal skin which is sometimes irritated and find that this cream helps to calm down excema , redness etc. On its own it does not reduce the wrinkles and crepey skin that come with aging but when layered and used in conjunction with hyaluronic based creams that are water based it makes a wonderful companion and does a good job of making my eyes look reasonable and ironing out some of the wrinkles and loss of firmness. It is easily absorbed , doesn't leave greasy skin so is great under make up. Can be used with day or night eye creams. Best of all it's a good price.

All the very small tubs and/or lip therapy, etc. come with an added color, flavor or something added besides 100% pure petroleum jelly which irritates my lips.Thank you for reading my concern & hopefully some day there will be \"pure vaseline\" in a lip balm / tube. Thank you.

product_description: Simple Kind to Hair Gentle Care Shampoo 200ml
review_text: Helped my scalp so much but the price is ridiculous when you consider the amount you have to use per wash and that you must buy the conditioner too. Any other non gentle brand would last me 4 times longer than this. It feels like people with illness are being rinsed (no pun intended). It's a no go for really long hair. I will be looking into other cheaper alternatives but the product is great. It's helped with my husbands dermatitis and with my sore scalp. At first my hair went dry and was like hay, then it was switching back and forth from dry to greasy but after a few weeks it's looking healthier than ever. I'm wondering if it just takes time for your hair to get used to less stuff on it and to get back to more of its natural form if you know what I mean.My main advice would be to try it for 6 weeks minimum before you write it off as rubbish.My only other annoyance aside from the price is that it's very thin and runny. It's hard to stop it running down my hair then off down my back so 20% of the bottle just goes down the plug hole without ever washing my hair first.
title_review_comments: Great but extortionate price Helped my scalp so much but the price is ridiculous when you consider the amount you have to use per wash and that you must buy the conditioner too. Any other non gentle brand would last me 4 times longer than this. It feels like people with illness are being rinsed (no pun intended). It's a no go for really long hair. I will be looking into other cheaper alternatives but the product is great. It's helped with my husbands dermatitis and with my sore scalp. At first my hair went dry and was like hay, then it was switching back and forth from dry to greasy but after a few weeks it's looking healthier than ever. I'm wondering if it just takes time for your hair to get used to less stuff on it and to get back to more of its natural form if you know what I mean.My main advice would be to try it for 6 weeks minimum before you write it off as rubbish.My only other annoyance aside from the price is that it's very thin and runny. It's hard to stop it running down my hair then off down my back so 20% of the bottle just goes down the plug hole without ever washing my hair first.

product_description: Persil Powercaps Non Bio Washing Capsules 38 Wash, 1026g
review_text: I used to only every purchase Fairy non bio liquid as my husband suffers with eczema and is extremely sensitive. I would have never purchased anything else but my brother said try Persil non bio its great for my nephews sensitive skin. He gave me some of his and I randomly washed clothes and bedding in Persil, as I didnt want my husband to say he had a flare down to the change. product_description: Simple Regeneration Age Resisting Night Cream 50ml
review_text: I'm nearly 26 so I said a year a go I must start using a night cream I have dry and sensitive skin I used the simple purifying cleansing lotion and soothing toner and light moisturiser there all amazing but the night is fantastic its moisturising and when I have spots it clears them up and makes my face look plump and takes my dryness away, It doesn't sting my eyes but the day cream does I think it's because of the SPF. Anyways really love this cream
title_review_comments: Normal to dry skin I'm nearly 26 so I said a year a go I must start using a night cream I have dry and sensitive skin I used the simple purifying cleansing lotion and soothing toner and light moisturiser there all amazing but the night is fantastic its moisturising and when I have spots it clears them up and makes my face look plump and takes my dryness away, It doesn't sting my eyes but the day cream does I think it's because of the SPF. Anyways really love this cream

product_description: Simple Kind to Hair Gentle Care Shampoo 200ml
review_title: Better Results After A Few Washes
review_text: Oddly enough this shampoo now performs much better than it did at the start. Not the most moisturising shampoo out there, my hair at first felt a little dry and stripped. However, not wanting to throw it out before I'd given it a good go, I persevered for a few more washes and now I'm glad I did. It leaves my hair soft and shiny, smooth and manageable and my scalp comfortable. It lathers and cleans well enough for my greasy roots without stripping the drier ends. Gives light moisture to hair without building up. It's grown on me and I now use it everyday!
title_review_comments: Better Results After A Few Washes Oddly enough this shampoo now performs much better than it did at the start. Not the most moisturising shampoo out there, my hair at first felt a little dry and stripped. However, not wanting to throw it out before I'd given it a good go, I persevered for a few more washes and now I'm glad I did. It leaves my hair soft and shiny, smooth and manageable and my scalp comfortable. It lathers and cleans well enough for my greasy roots without stripping the drier ends. Gives light moisture to hair without building up. It's grown on me and I now use it everyday!

product_description: Dove  Medium to Dark Skin Summer Revived 200ml
review_text: I don't have the time or energy to apply proper fake tan on a regular basis so I use this a few times a week instead. I'm actually really pale so I find the one for pale skin takes ages to show any colour so I buy this one for darker skin and it gives a lovely colour a bit sooner. You've got to be careful not to treat it like a moisturizer and rub it in well. Be careful on the elbows, wrists, knees and feet like you would with regular tanner. Lasts a long time on the skin and doesn't wear off in patches!

product_description: Persil Powercaps Bio Washing Capsules 38 Wash, 1026g
review_text: I tried these as Im fed up of powder and conditioner leaving a mess in the washing machine drawer and also taking up loads of space in the cupboards. Wed tried another brand however they werent perfumed and the other half likes his laundry to have a fragrance to it - personal preference. So I shopped around to find a cheap but known brand and found these in subscribe and save. Were using them every few days and can say we are quite happy with them. They smell nice but not over powering, leave no residue in the drum or on clothes, come in refill packs so I can top up my container and then the bin isnt full of powder boxes and they are easy to use as theres no question over how much to use. Also as a plus, they dont seem to bleach clothing as I found happened occasionally when using powder that got stuck in clothing and not rinsed out properly. If these stay at a good price then I will continue to buy as Im very happy with them.

They smell nice but not over powering, leave no residue in the drum or on clothes, come in refill packs so I can top up my container and then the bin isnt full of powder boxes and they are easy to use as theres no question over how much to use. Also as a plus, they dont seem to bleach clothing as I found happened occasionally when using powder that got stuck in clothing and not rinsed out properly. If these stay at a good price then I will continue to buy as Im very happy with them.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: Our household normally use comfort, however I hadn't used the 'Fresh Sky' scent before, which I must say is really nice! Just don't go sniffing directly from the bottle as it's concentrated, the scent is much more intense that it really is. The ultra concentrated allows for a much smaller bottle and you don't need to use as much in the washing machine either (just half a lid worth); the smaller bottle of course makes the carbon footprint smaller; in addition, the bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic which is a bonus, and both the bottle and lid can be recycled back. Only downside is the sleeve isn't, so do make sure you remove this before throwing the bottle in the recycling; hopefully they will work on making the whole thing recyclable in the future. All in all, good value for money and great scent (though the latter is subjective).
title_review_comments: Comfort Intense Laundry Conditioner Liquid Our household normally use comfort, however I hadn't used the 'Fresh Sky' scent before, which I must say is really nice! Just don't go sniffing directly from the bottle as it's concentrated, the scent is much more intense that it really is. The ultra concentrated allows for a much smaller bottle and you don't need to use as much in the washing machine either (just half a lid worth); the smaller bottle of course makes the carbon footprint smaller; in addition, the bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic which is a bonus, and both the bottle and lid can be recycled back. Only downside is the sleeve isn't, so do make sure you remove this before throwing the bottle in the recycling; hopefully they will work on making the whole thing recyclable in the future. All in all, good value for money and great scent (though the latter is subjective).

review_text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. I have been using it for about three weeks and it has completely transformed my skin. It2019s made it so soft, hydrated and smooth. I used to always struggle with the skin on and around my nose, it was always very dry and extremely dehydrated no matter what I tried and this is the only cream that has completely sorted them issues out. My make up now sits so nicely over my nose and the rest of my skin too. I purchased this sleeping cream and also the day version but I much prefer using this one day and night as the night one is that little bit more moisturising!

product_description: Comfort Honeysuckle & Sandalwood Fabric Conditioner 33 Wash
review_text: Lovely smell. Softens clothes. The whole range of Comfort is good. However, I think we all use too much product. The fragrance is strong and the consistency of the conditioner is reasonably thick.I now use half as much as I previously used. One third to half a cap is quite enough for a full wash load to soften and produce amazing scent. And softens clothes admirably. We don't need an overpowering blast of perfume, a subtle whiff is lovely. By using less, we are doing our small bit to save the planet through pollution. We are also saving money as I've noticed that a bottle of softener lasts twice as long. Its a win win!
title_review_comments: Use a little Lovely smell. Softens clothes. The whole range of Comfort is good. However, I think we all use too much product. The fragrance is strong and the consistency of the conditioner is reasonably thick.I now use half as much as I previously used. One third to half a cap is quite enough for a full wash load to soften and produce amazing scent. And softens clothes admirably. We don't need an overpowering blast of perfume, a subtle whiff is lovely. By using less, we are doing our small bit to save the planet through pollution. We are also saving money as I've noticed that a bottle of softener lasts twice as long. Its a win win!

product_description: Simple Kind To Skin Soothing Facial Toner 200ml
review_text: About two weeks after using this my bad cystic acne started to fade by the time i finished the bottle all my acne was gone.i thought i was just missing toner in my skin care so i started using a garnier one i had from a set .One week later my acne comes back so im back to using simple and my acne is fading again.i will never stop using this

product_description: Simple Kind To Skin Soothing Facial Toner 200ml
review_text: I bought this a couple of months ago along with the cleanser and moisturiser as i have spot prone, oily skin and occasional issues with dermatitis around my eyes. This was the worst mistake ever. I thought I was crazy as Simple is supposed to be gentle on the skin but after using this toner it has dried my skin out and bought the dermatitis back around my eyes so they are very red, the skin flaky and sore in places. At first i didn't think it was the toner but after two months of elimination it is definitely the toner drying out my skin. I would not recommend this product at all.
title_review_comments: Horribly Drying I bought this a couple of months ago along with the cleanser and moisturiser as i have spot prone, oily skin and occasional issues with dermatitis around my eyes. This was the worst mistake ever. I thought I was crazy as Simple is supposed to be gentle on the skin but after using this toner it has dried my skin out and bought the dermatitis back around my eyes so they are very red, the skin flaky and sore in places. At first i didn't think it was the toner but after two months of elimination it is definitely the toner drying out my skin. I would not recommend this product at all.

product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_text: My wife has extremely sensitive skin, which I never believed until I inadvertently washed some of her clothing in a different detergent. On that basis, she has used either Persil or Fairy products for our joint laundry for many years. Combine that with the fact that we cannot use biological products as we have a septic tank, this product is ideal. The detergent is dispensed into a capsule which is inserted into the main body of the product and then placed on top of the laundry. There is sufficient detergent for 48 washes from the two bottles. The detergent is complimented by a fabric conditioner, which is measured out into the fabric compartment softener on the washing machine; there is sufficient to condition 24 washes. Both products have a pleasant "clean" fragrance and leave clothing smelling fresh and soft after drying. A really good product for those with sensitive skin and competitively priced against normal supermarket prices.
title_review_comments: Great for sensitive skin My wife has extremely sensitive skin, which I never believed until I inadvertently washed some of her clothing in a different detergent. On that basis, she has used either Persil or Fairy products for our joint laundry for many years. Combine that with the fact that we cannot use biological products as we have a septic tank, this product is ideal. The detergent is dispensed into a capsule which is inserted into the main body of the product and then placed on top of the laundry. There is sufficient detergent for 48 washes from the two bottles. The detergent is complimented by a fabric conditioner, which is measured out into the fabric compartment softener on the washing machine; there is sufficient to condition 24 washes. Both products have a pleasant "clean" fragrance and leave clothing smelling fresh and soft after drying. A really good product for those with sensitive skin and competitively priced against normal supermarket prices.

product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_text: In this "kit" for sensitive skin you get x2 Persil non-biological washing detergent (potentially 48 washes) and x1 ultra-concentrate Comfort Pure (potentially 38 washes). I say potentially because if you are doing larger loads you'll need to increase the amount you use. We tend to alternate between Fairy and Persil non-bio, not only because we have young children but also because some family members have sensitive skin. We've never had an issue with someone having a reaction due to Persil, it's probably our preferred brand. We don't use Comfort Pure all the time because some members of the family don't like how it leaves their clothes feeling (too soft!), but we do use it on the children's clothes because it leaves them nice and soft. Both products in this kit are endorsed by the British Skin Foundation. Price for the kit at the time of writing the review is £11, this is slightly more than you would currently get the individual products in some supermarkets (£3 for each product). But you are getting them delivered too. If you wanted to give a practical baby shower gift, this would be ideal, slightly different to a nappy pyramid. Would also make a practical house-warming present. Overall - good products that work, slightly on the expensive side.
title_review_comments: Persil and Comfort Sensitive Kit In this "kit" for sensitive skin you get x2 Persil non-biological washing detergent (potentially 48 washes) and x1 ultra-concentrate Comfort Pure (potentially 38 washes). I say potentially because if you are doing larger loads you'll need to increase the amount you use. We tend to alternate between Fairy and Persil non-bio, not only because we have young children but also because some family members have sensitive skin. We've never had an issue with someone having a reaction due to Persil, it's probably our preferred brand. product_description: Dove  Summer Revived Shimmer Gradual Tan 200ml
review_text: My daughter recommended this to me as she has been using it for last two years and I always commented on her lovely natural tanned legs. Thought I would try this instead of my usual St.Tropez Gradual Tan the one you use in the shower. Well I am so glad I did as it not only gave me natural tan but also had a slight shimmer to it which made my legs look a lot healthier considering I am over 60 and it does not have that awful smell either like other fake tans. I use it once every other day and in between use a body polish to get rid of any dead skin cells and this products seems to work well doing it this way.

product_description: Simple Water Boost Skin Quench Sleeping Cream 50ml
review_text: Do NOT buy this or any other simple products as they have changed the preservatives in them. I have come out in a bad sore rash my eyes are burning and my top lip tingled I had to wash it all off! I phoned simple and she told me they have had a product change in all their stuff changing the preservatives!! When I asked WHY she just said I don't know it just changed. I want to know why!!?? There's no good reason except maybe for them to save money using cheaper ingredients!! I've used simple products for nearly 20 years since Nivea did the same and sold their company to a German company who changed all their products. Im really angry about this what am I supposed to use now. I have VERY sensitive skin and simple was ok but now it's rubbish! Im skin is sore burnt and simple just don't care!! Please be careful as I usually stock up when my products are on offer but fully Asda gave me a refund onto a gift card as I didn't have the receipt for the 6 bottles I had or I'd have been well out if pocket!!??

product_description: Dove  Medium to Dark Skin Summer Revived 200ml
review_text: Can't go wrong for the price! I often use this alongside fake tan to sustain the colour and my skin often gets dry after applying fake tan so this helps to keep it hydrated! It's so quick and easy to apply. You can apply either morning or night and leave on - you'll see results quickly! So good to take away on holiday too to give you that extra summer glow and colour that's so easy to do! However... once you've finished applying, make sure you wash your hands or wipe your palms with a wet wipe. Also clean your nails thoroughly as the colour can stick there as you're using your hands to apply. Other than that, really recommends this product and it's such good value for money!
title_review_comments: Simple application and great results! Can't go wrong for the price! I often use this alongside fake tan to sustain the colour and my skin often gets dry after applying fake tan so this helps to keep it hydrated! It's so quick and easy to apply. You can apply either morning or night and leave on - you'll see results quickly! So good to take away on holiday too to give you that extra summer glow and colour that's so easy to do! However... once you've finished applying, make sure you wash your hands or wipe your palms with a wet wipe. Also clean your nails thoroughly as the colour can stick there as you're using your hands to apply. Other than that, really recommends this product and it's such good value for money!

product_description: Dove Nourishing Medium to Dark Visible Glow 400ml
review_text: After being caught out by the sudden nice weather and me still being as pale as an uncooked chip I bought a bottle of this to try. The very first time I used it, I did have a couple of streaks on my legs then I read the instructions and realised it says you must apply it in circles, so the next day I used a liberal amount and made sure to use a circular motion all over and I was delighted that on only the second day I had enough colour to go bare-legged (it had also covered up the streaks too)I have now applied this for 4 days running and look like I have been away for a week in the sun. It is a really natural even colour. There is a bit of a whiff of fake tan when you first apply it but it wears off after a few hours. My skins feels so smooth and moisturised too which is an added bonus!
title_review_comments: Love this! After being caught out by the sudden nice weather and me still being as pale as an uncooked chip I bought a bottle of this to try. The very first time I used it, I did have a couple of streaks on my legs then I read the instructions and realised it says you must apply it in circles, so the next day I used a liberal amount and made sure to use a circular motion all over and I was delighted that on only the second day I had enough colour to go bare-legged (it had also covered up the streaks too)I have now applied this for 4 days running and look like I have been away for a week in the sun. It is a really natural even colour. There is a bit of a whiff of fake tan when you first apply it but it wears off after a few hours. My skins feels so smooth and moisturised too which is an added bonus!

product_description: Dove Nourishing Medium to Dark Visible Glow 400ml
review_title: If you're not a fan of tan, you'll be converted!
review_text: I've always longed for more of a healthy colour to my skin as I am extremely pale, but have been put off each time I have used a tanning product because- well, it's been disastrous. However! This is the first (and only) successful product that i have used which creates a beautifully even, healthy and natural tan within a few days.I could not rate this enough. I also have sensitive, spot-prone skin on my face but I have been able to use this on my face successfully as well. Long-lasting, deeply moisturising and super natural. 10/10 my favourite!
title_review_comments: If you're not a fan of tan, you'll be converted! I've always longed for more of a healthy colour to my skin as I am extremely pale, but have been put off each time I have used a tanning product because- well, it's been disastrous. However! This is the first (and only) successful product that i have used which creates a beautifully even, healthy and natural tan within a few days.I could not rate this enough. I also have sensitive, spot-prone skin on my face but I have been able to use this on my face successfully as well. Long-lasting, deeply moisturising and super natural. 10/10 my favourite!

It's nice to see this is on offer as I wouldn't buy it for nearly £4 I'd go to savers instead and get it as it is normally £1.95. Overall, buy it, smell it, pamper yourself and if you love baths you can get this scent in dove bubble bath too. Hehehe. Enjoy!

product_description: Dove DermaSpa Fair to Medium Summer Revived 200ml
review_text: Purchased because it was on offer and my blindingly white legs needed a bit of help. I only wanted a gradual tanner because there is less chance of obvious streaks. It smelt nice on application, a light floral scent. However within a few hours it smelt stronger than actual full on fake tan - very unpleasant. I could also feel the cream sitting on my skin, not fully absorbed or dry. The actual tanning result was barely noticeable. I won't be buying again.

product_description: Dove DermaSpa Fair to Medium Summer Revived 200ml
review_title: Love it, natural looking bronzed glow
review_text: Love this! I am fair haired, blue eyed, lily white skin older lady who burns to a crisp in the sun, when i uncover. Having just returned from holiday i wanted to at least look like i had a tan but it was very cold there. I bought this on offer and went for Fair - Med. The first time i put it on my arms all over sparingly i didnt really notice that much although there was definately something. Today i thought let me add a bit more after a my usual morning shower. I applied a bit more liberally over arms legs, and face. I have had comments today on what a lovely glow i have. It has developed nicely today. I have a sassy looking healthy bod and i feel good. Bought another tube and just ordered a few more whilst on offer. I hate sitting in the sun and burning (unless i am covered in P20 lotion) and this is a very safe way to get the bronze look. No streaks, easy to apply, doesnt stain hands, slight tan smell but not too much. I am hooked.

Just goes to show that all the fancy, long named, sciencey products don't always come up on top over simple and gentle products like this one.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Follow the pouring instructions and you are on a winner!
review_text: Great fragrance that strikes just the right balance - although the wife complains that the small bottles are very difficult to pour accurately from. They probably are if you slurp in what you reckon is a full measure and, in fact, it is nearer two full measures. This is a really quick way to use up a small 540 ml bottle.but.if you use the cap as a measure as it is supposed to be..then you will find it is a very economical way to use the conditioner! Very cool fragrance which actually carries through to your clothes, making you smell like a Fresh Sky  if you know what such a thing smells like? Something else I really like about this conditioner is that the bottles are all made from recyclable plastic and the manufacturer is asking for customers to recycle the new bottles so they can go the same path third time around! Three Stars for the product and another one for being good and green.
title_review_comments: Follow the pouring instructions and you are on a winner! product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Economical, softens clothes, not as good as dedicated fragrancers if you want a lasting scent
review_text: Great price for these bottles, and you only need a small amount (half a cap) in the wash to soften clothes. The smell is nice but doesn't last - if you want something that lingers, try Lenor Unstoppables (but that won't soften clothes). That said, the softening effect is noticeable, even when handwashing delicate underwear. I like the ultra concentration which reduces the size of the bottles for storage.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: This is an ultra concentrated fabric conditioner. I was initially surprised at how small the bottles were but then I read on the side that you only need half a cap of the product so each bottle will last you a while. It is nice to be able to fit the bottles in my kitchen cupboard! I did find that half a cap was enough. I live in an area with very hard water and my clothes came out of the wash feeling soft and smelling lovely. I did really like the scent although it is nothing special (it just had that generic floral fabric conditioner scent that they all have).

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Comfort Intense Laundry Conditioner Liquid (Fresh Sky)
review_text: Our household normally use comfort, however I hadn't used the 'Fresh Sky' scent before, which I must say is really nice! Just don't go sniffing directly from the bottle as it's concentrated, the scent is much more intense that it really is. The ultra concentrated allows for a much smaller bottle and you don't need to use as much in the washing machine either (just half a lid worth); the smaller bottle of course makes the carbon footprint smaller; in addition, the bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic which is a bonus, and both the bottle and lid can be recycled back. Only downside is the sleeve isn't, so do make sure you remove this before throwing the bottle in the recycling; hopefully they will work on making the whole thing recyclable in the future. All in all, good value for money and great scent (though the latter is subjective).
title_review_comments: Comfort Intense Laundry Conditioner Liquid (Fresh Sky) Our household normally use comfort, however I hadn't used the 'Fresh Sky' scent before, which I must say is really nice! Just don't go sniffing directly from the bottle as it's concentrated, the scent is much more intense that it really is. The ultra concentrated allows for a much smaller bottle and you don't need to use as much in the washing machine either (just half a lid worth); the smaller bottle of course makes the carbon footprint smaller; in addition, the bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic which is a bonus, and both the bottle and lid can be recycled back. Only downside is the sleeve isn't, so do make sure you remove this before throwing the bottle in the recycling; hopefully they will work on making the whole thing recyclable in the future. product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: This listing is for a pack of 8, concentrated fabric softeners, although I received a sample for review purposes. Note that the container is made from 100% recycled plastic and is suitable for further recycling, but you do need to remove the plastic wrap that holds the product information (once the bottle is used up, as you need it beforehand for dosing information). I found I needed to use a jar opener to remove the lid for the first time; I guess that is good when you are receiving this via the post as it means there is less chance of the lid coming loose and spilling contents into the parcel rather than onto your clothes. I like the scent, which transfers well to laundry and leaves it smelling floral without being overly sweet. It would be worth sniffing in a shop before committing to a large pack however, as not all laundry scents are to everyones taste. The softness is fantastic, particularly noticeable after laundry has been dried outside, which normally makes it feel stiff. A bottle will cover up to 36 loads (4-5 Kg), you will only manage 16 larger, 6-7 Kg loads. The bottle looks small, but the liquid is very concentrated, so do use the dosing cap rather than just pour into the machine as you will otherwise use too much (probably).

I like the scent, which transfers well to laundry and leaves it smelling floral without being overly sweet. It would be worth sniffing in a shop before committing to a large pack however, as not all laundry scents are to everyones taste. The softness is fantastic, particularly noticeable after laundry has been dried outside, which normally makes it feel stiff. A bottle will cover up to 36 loads (4-5 Kg), you will only manage 16 larger, 6-7 Kg loads. The bottle looks small, but the liquid is very concentrated, so do use the dosing cap rather than just pour into the machine as you will otherwise use too much (probably).

product_description: Magnum  Double Raspberry Ice Cream 3 x 88ml
review_text: If I was a wild-eyed enthusiast and was asked to rate free Magnums as part of a promotion I'd perhaps err on the generous side. As a paying customer, however, these are nothing to write home about. There's an uncomfortable flavour clash, between the dark chocolate coating and the sickly sweet raspberry sauce which covers the core, that's difficult to describe. The core itself reminded me of the cheapest imaginable insipid, own brand raspberry ice-cream with little of the smooth creaminess you find in other Magnums. It's almost as if they rushed the product development process and ended up with bitter raspberry ripple on a stick. So, so disappointing when you consider what these could have been.
title_review_comments: My least favourite Magnum If I was a wild-eyed enthusiast and was asked to rate free Magnums as part of a promotion I'd perhaps err on the generous side. As a paying customer, however, these are nothing to write home about. There's an uncomfortable flavour clash, between the dark chocolate coating and the sickly sweet raspberry sauce which covers the core, that's difficult to describe. The core itself reminded me of the cheapest imaginable insipid, own brand raspberry ice-cream with little of the smooth creaminess you find in other Magnums. It's almost as if they rushed the product development process and ended up with bitter raspberry ripple on a stick. So, so disappointing when you consider what these could have been.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Easy to pour as smaller, lighter bottles
review_text: Because the bottles are smaller and lighter, and I have a touch of stiffness in my hands I find these much easier to pick up and pour them than the traditional larger bottles, although I did have a bit of a struggle getting the lid off the first time. The scent is fresh, floral and pleasant, and not overpowering, and it lingers on washing well afterwards too. The bottles are reasonably good value as a little goes a long way - A half capful is recommended for washes of 4-5 kg, and a full capful for larger washes. There are 36 washes based on the half capful dose for 4-5kg loads, so as I usually do larger loads I should get approximately 18 washes per bottle. The bottle is made from 100% recycled plastic and it can be recycled again, except for the plastic sleeve.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: These are 540ml bottles giving 36 wash loads of Fuchsia Passion fabric conditioner by Comfort. The bottles are entirely plastic, made from 100% recycled plastic and are 100% recyclable. The bottles have a narrow screw top, which is used as the measure, and the bottle has an accurate slim pourer  no dribbles. This one is concentrated and needs only ½ a capful for each washload. I've used Comfort on and off for many years and this Fuchsia Passion fragrance is a very nice, light floral fragrance. My towels and clothing all felt nice and soft after being washed and dried, and had a lovely smell of flowers with a hint of fruit  mango?  and freshly laundered clothing. It's not too strong or overpowering at all  just a nice smell of just washed clothes.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: Clearly this latest product variation from Comfort is to address some environmental concerns and plastics waste. The product is highly concentrated, so comes in a smaller bottle that is itself recycled. Reduced packaging and transport costs. All very commendable. Just how concentrated the product is can be sensed from the fact that you can detect the scent before you even open the bottle. When you do, don't breath deeply (as I did), it's overpowering. However, in it's more dilute form (just half a cap per load), it does add a pleasant, slightly zesty aroma to your clothes. The scent will be a matter of taste, but we like it and our washing feels soft and pleasant (though we were already regular Comfort users). In this form the product represents good value for a quality product and for those who want to lessen their impact on the environment (albeit in the smallest of ways), there's something for you here, too.
title_review_comments: Small but Mighty Clearly this latest product variation from Comfort is to address some environmental concerns and plastics waste. product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_text: Superb kit. The persil non-bio is great and we use it for all our clothes and other than really stubborn stains its great. One word of warning. Although it does say it handles a 30c wash, I tend to go at least 40 to ensure the gel has been thoroughly rinsed from the machine and clothes. A washing machine repair guy once told me 30 was a false economy especially if using gel as it can build up over time and cause issues. The comfort is really nice. Leaves fabric soft and huggable.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Fabulous scent and lovely soft laundry.
review_text: I did a large amount of laundry yesterday and was immediately impressed with the scent of this fabric conditioner. Fuchsia Passion is delightful, such a lovely scent. As this is ultra concentrated you only need a little amount. I tumble dried most of the clothes and they came out soft and smelling lovely. I often find the tumble dryer makes laundry lose any scent but not on this occasion. I dried some clothes on a clothes horse and was delighted that the whole room took on a lovely scent. I am very impressed that Comfort have concentrated their fabric conditioner and are using recycled plastic in the bottle to cut the amount of plastics used. The whole bottle bar the wrapper is recyclable. The bottle is small (see picture) but as it is ultra concentrated it still lasts as long as a larger bottle. Highly recommended product.
title_review_comments: Fabulous scent and lovely soft laundry. I did a large amount of laundry yesterday and was immediately impressed with the scent of this fabric conditioner. Fuchsia Passion is delightful, such a lovely scent. As this is ultra concentrated you only need a little amount. I tumble dried most of the clothes and they came out soft and smelling lovely. I often find the tumble dryer makes laundry lose any scent but not on this occasion. I dried some clothes on a clothes horse and was delighted that the whole room took on a lovely scent. I am very impressed that Comfort have concentrated their fabric conditioner and are using recycled plastic in the bottle to cut the amount of plastics used. The whole bottle bar the wrapper is recyclable. The bottle is small (see picture) but as it is ultra concentrated it still lasts as long as a larger bottle. Highly recommended product.

review_title: Better for the environment if used correctly
review_text: It's great that a lot of effort has been made to reduce the plastic needed for this product and by making the softener more concentrated less of that is needed too, though I see some buyers say they're still using the same amount they're used to doing with the larger bottles. This probably explains why there is so much said on the label explaining that a little goes a long way with this product. I have the fuchsia perfume version which smells OK and isn't overpowering. This is a big plus for me as I have had difficulty with the intensely perfumed products in the past. Note that the outer plastic sleeve isn't recyclable, so this needs to be disposed of separately.

product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_title: Relied on for decades this is the best Non Bio
review_text: I have used this brand forever and love the way it never upsets any skin, especially when washing sheets and items that are next to the body such as jeans, underwear. Ever since I had small babies and now helping with grandchildren, this is the most child-friendly of all the branded washing products. Recommended by the Skin Foundation means you can try any eczema-afflicted skin with this item with confidence. Having the smaller, ultra concentrated Pure Comfort as an extra means you can dish up an extra helping of softness when required. Just a little amount will do the job. Altogether 48 washes from the two handy bottles of Persil's Non-Bio liquid detergent can be carefully measured into the bubble pod, so no waste. In our soft water area, the lesser amount can be used. Yes, it still sorts out everyday stains, no worries there. The scent is fresh and clean, the whole house smells lovely when the laundry is on the go, being aired and ironed.

review_text: I was asked if Id like to review Comfort Intense Fabric Conditioner Liquid, Fuchsia Passion, 540 ml, 216 Wash, Pack of 8, and I said yes. This has a lovely fragrance and gives your wash a lovely outside fresh fragrance. Be warned they are small bottles but the fabric conditioner is ultra-concentrated, so a little goes a long way. Its nice to see that this bottle is made of 100% recycled plastic. The scent has a nice floral smell, but as it's concentrated, if you are having a sniff test direct from the bottom, it will of course seem a bit too intense. product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: It's a fabric conditioner not a game changer.
review_text: The hype attached to the scent of fabric conditioner is something as a family we ignore. All we want is for the clothes to smell fresh and pleasant after a wash, to be soft and comfortable to wear and for the product to be economical. Fortunately, this one fulfills all the criteria. When I say 'to smell fresh and pleasant' I don't mean stink the place out with the scent and overpower and wilt everything in a 100 yard radius. Again, fortunately, this doesn't do so and so gets a general thumbs up, but I could have done without the wording bigging up the wonderfulness of the smells. To me that's an alarm call not to purchase! I'll whisk myself away with my own favourite perfumes. I don't want my clothes having a big-smell life of their own!
title_review_comments: It's a fabric conditioner not a game changer. The hype attached to the scent of fabric conditioner is something as a family we ignore. product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_title: Nice, gentle products that don't upset my family's eczema-prone skin
review_text: These are gentle, skin-kind versions within the Persil and Comfort ranges. The bundled pack is a practical suggestion that offers good value compared to the individual retail prices of 2x25 wash Persil and 1x38 wash Comfort, making the fabric softener effectively free. I can't remember not using Persil non-biological as my laundry detergent of choice, it's the brand I grew up with - one that doesn't irritate the eczema and allergy prone skin of several members of my family. It has a pleasant, but not overly dominant scent, and the fluid formulation means this can be used even on cold washes. The Comfort is a highly concentrated version in quite a small bottle. In real life, the bottle is rather smaller than the product photo makes it appear in relation to the Persil, but this doesn't represent poor value (38 washes worth is 38 washes worth regardless of the size container in which it comes) and the small size does a good job of keeping the use of packaging materials down.
title_review_comments: Nice, gentle products that don't upset my family's eczema-prone skin These are gentle, skin-kind versions within the Persil and Comfort ranges. The bundled pack is a practical suggestion that offers good value compared to the individual retail prices of 2x25 wash Persil and 1x38 wash Comfort, making the fabric softener effectively free. I can't remember not using Persil non-biological as my laundry detergent of choice, it's the brand I grew up with - one that doesn't irritate the eczema and allergy prone skin of several members of my family. It has a pleasant, but not overly dominant scent, and the fluid formulation means this can be used even on cold washes. The Comfort is a highly concentrated version in quite a small bottle. In real life, the bottle is rather smaller than the product photo makes it appear in relation to the Persil, but this doesn't represent poor value (38 washes worth is 38 washes worth regardless of the size container in which it comes) and the small size does a good job of keeping the use of packaging materials down.

product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_title: I'm returning to the Persil non-bio fold.
review_text: I used Persil non-bio for many years, but changed to a brand specifically for babies about eight years ago, so it was a bit of a homecoming using it again. I really like the flip-top opening and how smoothly the product pours into the dispenser ball, which is much easier than the crosscut design on my usual brand that requires a fair amount of pressure. I never had a problem with how well Persil cleans, and this hasnt changed; a machine load of baby clothes  together with stains - muslins and bedding came out spotless. With the addition of the Comfort Pure conditioner, the laundry was very soft and smelled lovely. It also performs well on general washing. I have decided to go back to using Persil non-bio; not just for the frustration-free dispenser, but it performs so well and is kind to skin. Using it again has made me wonder why I ever left the brand in the first place.

product_description: Persil & Comfort New Baby Essential Laundry Kit(3 Items)
review_title: A good-value bundle for sensitive skin, featuring two bottles of Persil and one of Comfort
review_text: Although biological detergents are generally more effective than non-bio versions this version of Persil works well enough on babies wear and on normal soiling of the clothes of older people with sensitive skin. This handy pack includes two bottles of Persil non-bio liquid detergent (24 wash size) and one of Comfort Pure fabric conditioner (36 wash size) and is decent value at eleven pounds currently from Amazon. These two non-biological products are dermatologically tested and endorsed by the British Skin Foundation  they have been developed especially to be kind to sensitive baby skin. Good cleaning power for a non-biological washing detergent with soft and safe conditioning  well worth trying on your little one's clothes, or on your own if you have sensitive skin.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fuchsia Passion Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: Clearly this latest product variation from Comfort is to address some environmental concerns and plastics waste. The product is highly concentrated, so comes in a smaller bottle that is itself recycled. Reduced packaging and transport costs. All very commendable. Just how concentrated the product is can be sensed from the fact that you can detect the scent before you even open the bottle. When you do, don't breath deeply (as I did), it's overpowering. However, in it's more dilute form (just half a cap per load), it does add a pleasant, attractively "flowery" aroma to your clothes. All scents will be a matter of taste, but we like it and our washing feels soft and pleasant (though we were already regular Comfort users). In this form the product represents good value for a quality product and for those who want to lessen their impact on the environment (albeit in the smallest of ways), there's something for you here, too.
title_review_comments: Concentrated Flowers Clearly this latest product variation from Comfort is to address some environmental concerns and plastics waste. product_description: Marmite  Spread Yeast Extract 500g
review_text: Been eating Marmite for nearly 70 years and always have a 500 gram jar in the cupboard. Try it on buttered toast, Mucky fat (Pork dripping with the brown jelly) on toast, in a sandwich with cheese, or sliced tomato or sliced boiled egg. Put it on your toast when having beans on toast, or add a couple of teaspoons to a mug of hot water for a tasty drink. Good in a stew or casserole or mixed with butter on a baked potato. It's definitely a love or hate thing....I love it and always take it on holiday if I think it won't be available wherever I'm going.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_text: I was a bit worried that a product called 'Intense' might leave an overpowering scent on your laundry, who wants to walk around smelling of fabric conditioner? Thankfully it's not like that at all and the scent it leaves is fresh and quite subtle (once dry) and lingers around without being too pervasive. The Fresh Sky fragrance is appealing and not too chemical-like with a fruity/floral mix. For me, it suits household items more than clothes, things like towels and bed linen are left softened and fresh-smelling. I appreciate the small bottle size and concentrated liquid and that it has less environmental impact but I do think that the concentrated liquids are less effective at softening than the more dilute liquids are. If you're looking for the best softening then consider a full-sized bottle but if you prefer a more subtle softening effect but the same fresh fragrance then this concentrated version is a great buy.
title_review_comments: Sky fresh... I was a bit worried that a product called 'Intense' might leave an overpowering scent on your laundry, who wants to walk around smelling of fabric conditioner? The Fresh Sky fragrance is appealing and not too chemical-like with a fruity/floral mix. If you're looking for the best softening then consider a full-sized bottle but if you prefer a more subtle softening effect but the same fresh fragrance then this concentrated version is a great buy.

product_description: Comfort Intense Fresh Sky Fabric Conditioner 38 Wash 570ml
review_title: Doesn't just soften and scent the wash, but the whole house smells fresh and clean!
review_text: I've not used a separate conditioner in years, because most washing products these days seem to do it all. I hadn't realised how much of a scent boost a separate fabric conditioner delivers, and how much it actually does soften the wash. The bottles - 6 of them, and not 8 as the ad states, come in a compact box and tbh, that itself could be used to deliver the products in, rather than having that placed in an Amazon box with more paper wrapping. All of the packaging, including the empty bottles, can be recycled. You don't waste any of the liquid, as the top of the bottle is well designed to minimise spillage and so that you can pour just what you need (half a capful is recommended, but I went with a little more), and not a gush of liquid from a large spout. I've had to dry indoors today due to the weather, and my whole house smells of this. I'm really impressed with this, and even for 6 bottles rather than the stated 8, this is good value for money. I also like that the small bottles mean that I can store them on a lower shelf for heavier items, rather than risking my under-sink shelving collapsing (yes, it's happened more than once!). Just don't squeeze the bottles hard, as they're made from recycled plastic and are a little flimsy-feeling.

Just don't squeeze the bottles hard, as they're made from recycled plastic and are a little flimsy-feeling.
